com.complet

Class RunClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.complet.RunClass
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class RunClass
extends java.lang.Thread

    Run Class - RunClass.java

    The Run Class is a class that contains what the threads will do. It also Ensures that all thread are finished before proceeding to next run.
    Since:
    2017-01-02
    Version:
    6.0
    Author:
    Complet

    • Method Detail

      • begin

        public static void begin()

        begin is the first method of this class. It creates 3 threads and ensures these threads are finished. When threads are finished it empties finalist in order to get it ready for next run.

        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - which occurs if one of the threads unexpectedly is interrupted.

      • run

        public final void run()

        Run Method. Calls the start method from LinkRetrieve class in order the extraction to begin. Simultaneously it filters links containing meta robot tags. This is also where layers are controlled.

        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - which occurs when something in the Robot Tags Class Goes Wrong.
